title: Beef steaks with celeriac & caper remoulade

ingredients.item: 300g pack Aberdeen Angus beef frying steak
½ tsp Cooks’ Ingredients Organic Herbes De Provence
½ bunch salad onions, finely chopped

instructions.step: Rub the steaks with the herbs and a little seasoning. Cut away the skin from the celeriac and shred the flesh in a food processor. (Alternatively slice it as thinly as possible and then cut across into very fine, matchstick-width pieces.) Put the celeriac in a bowl and stir in the vinaigrette, mayonnaise, salad onions, capers, parsley and a little seasoning.

Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Fry the steaks for 2 minutes on each side. This will leave them pink in the centre. For well-done steaks allow 3-4 minutes per side. Serve with the celeriac alongside.
